name: CTU Buddy Educational System
desc: An educational system developed as a project for CTU Training Solutions.

name: Library Management System
desc: A Java-based terminal application for managing library operations, including book and member management, and book checkout functionality.

name: Zoo Management System
desc: A C# application with a graphical user interface (GUI) for managing zoo activities, allowing tasks like adding/removing animals and various management action.

name: Shop Management System
desc: A Python-based terminal software solution for managing shop operations, focusing on tasks such as adding stock.
